name: Ant Design Open Source
description:
Ant Design Open Source is a free and easy to use Figma library that's always up to date with the latest changes to the official repo. Ant design provides plenty of UI components to enrich your web applications, and we will improve the components experience consistently.

Ant Design Open Source follow exactly the document, guideline, and code from Ant Design Document and is recommended as a valuable design resource that designers should use on Ant Design Official site.

---

Finding this helpful? A nomination will be highly appreciated! 🎖

you can also support me and help make it better!

Buy Me a Coffee ☕️

---

Recent Updates Highlight:


June 06 2022:

  • Redone Button Variants
  • Updated layout blocks
  • Redone Input Variants
  • Updated tooltip components


May 04 2022:

  • Added new component: Segemented
  • Simplified all Table Cell components


Apr 04 2022:

  • Updated left padding on expandable table rows
  • Updated table cells to use single borders
  • Simplified table header structures
  • Simplified button icon structures
  • Add description for all components
  • Other minor bug fixes


Feb 21 2022:

  • Improved AL responsiveness of dropdown menus
  • Consistency update on form

Nov 17 2021:

  • Refined Tabs and Added Vertical Filled variants in Size property
  • Added light blue background for the preview image of all key components

Nov 16 2021:

  • Added Full Component Interactivity

June 5 2021:

  • Redone Menu component
  • Many many bug fixes

May 5 2021:

  • Added Row based Table
  • Refactored some additional components into component sets

Mar 18th 2021:

  • Implemented some interactive components, will be adding more.
  • Fixed a glitch where some table column's row separators were 0.5px off
  • Drastically reduced the documentation cluttering
  • Added Time Picker Component Set
  • Added "How to use" for layout-blocks
  • Made Transfer list item properties more consistent

Jan 17th 2021:

  • Now you can search components using Chinese and Russian keywords.

Dec 31th 2020:

  • Added more documentations

Dec 29th 2020:

  • Table Update: Toolbar & Row selection
